name: Andrey Scorob
description: I just wanted something that would remove the neon colors that distracted me fromlearning a coding language on a good website for free. The website looked messy with allthe ads. I got this extensions and reloaded the website. Instead of the ads, there wasjust empty white space! It felt like a breath of fresh air. Finally not suffocated byads! Now I can learn Swift and Java on this website with a better learning environment.Thank you. I love how good this extension is and that it's free.
